resources.string: SHIELD storage is full. Delete some files to free space.
SHIELD options
SHIELD will shut down.
SHIELD options
Allows the app to read SMS messages stored on your SHIELD or SIM card. This allows the app to read all SMS messages, regardless of content or confidentiality.
Allows the app to write to SMS messages stored on your SHIELD or SIM card. Malicious apps may delete your messages.
Allows the app to deliver its own input events (key presses, etc.) to other apps. Malicious apps may use this to take over SHIELD.
Allows the app to make parts of itself persistent in memory. This can limit memory available to other apps and slow down SHIELD.
Allows the app to free SHIELD storage by deleting files in the cache directories of other apps. This may cause other apps to start up more slowly as they need to re-retrieve their data.

Allows the app to read from the system\'s various log files. This allows it to discover general information about what you are doing with SHIELD, potentially including personal or private information.

Allows the app to change whether a component of another app is enabled or not. Malicious apps may use this to disable important SHIELD capabilities. Care must be used with this permission, as it is possible to get app components into an unusable, inconsistent, or unstable state.

Allows the app to have itself started as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start SHIELD and allow the app to slow down overall SHIELD performance by always running.
Allows the app to send sticky broadcasts, which remain after the broadcast ends. Excessive use may make SHIELD slow or unstable by causing it to use too much memory.

Allows the app to read data about your contacts stored on SHIELD, including the frequency with which you\'ve called, emailed, or communicated in other ways with specific individuals. This permission allows apps to save your contact data, and malicious apps may share contact data without your knowledge.

Allows the app to modify the data about your contacts stored on your SHIELD, including the frequency with which you\'ve called, emailed, or communicated in other ways with specific contacts. This permission allows apps to delete contact data.

Allows the app to read SHIELD\'s call log, including data about incoming and outgoing calls. This permission allows apps to save your call log data, and malicious apps may share call log data without your knowledge.
Allows the app to modify SHIELD\'s call log, including data about incoming and outgoing calls. Malicious apps may use this to erase or modify your call log.

Allows the app to read all calendar events stored on your SHIELD, including those of friends or co-workers. This may allow the app to share or save your calendar data, regardless of confidentiality or sensitivity.

Allows the app to add, remove, and change events that you can modify on your SHIELD, including those of friends or co-workers. This may allow the app to send messages that appear to come from calendar owners, or modify events without the owners\' knowledge.
permanently disable SHIELD
Allows the app to permanently disable SHIELD. This is very dangerous.
force SHIELD reboot
Allows the app to force SHIELD to reboot.
directly start CDMA SHIELD setup
prevent SHIELD from sleeping
Allows the app to prevent SHIELD from going to sleep.
power SHIELD on or off
Allows the app to turn SHIELD on or off.
adjust NVIDIA Tegra CPU
Allows the app to adjust parameters of the NVIDA Tegra CPU. This may consume extra power.
Run as a low-level manufacturer test, allowing complete access to SHIELD hardware. Only available when SHIELD is running in manufacturer test mode.
Allows the app to change SHIELD\'s clock time.
Allows the app to change SHIELD\'s time zone.
Allows the app to get the list of accounts known by SHIELD. This may include any accounts created by applications you have installed.
Allows the app to receive packets sent to all devices on a Wi-Fi network using multicast addresses, not just your SHIELD. It uses more power than the non-multicast mode.
Allows the app to configure the local Bluetooth SHIELD, and to discover and pair with remote devices.
Allows the app to connect SHIELD to and disconnect SHIELD from WiMAX networks.
Allows the app to view the configuration of Bluetooth on SHIELD, and to make and accept connections with paired devices.
Monitor the number of incorrect passwords typed when unlocking the screen, and lock SHIELD or erase all SHIELD\'s data if too many incorrect passwords are typed.
Erase SHIELD\'s data without warning by performing a factory data reset.
No SIM card in SHIELD.
You have incorrectly drawn your unlock pattern %d times. After %d more unsuccessful attempts, you will be asked to unlock your SHIELD using your Google signin.\n\nTry again in %d seconds.
You have incorrectly attempted to unlock SHIELD %d times. After %d more unsuccessful attempts, SHIELD will be reset to the factory default and all user data will be lost.
You have incorrectly attempted to unlock SHIELD %d times. SHIELD will now be reset to the factory default.

Allows the app to modify the browser\'s history or bookmarks stored on SHIELD. This may allow the app to erase or modify browser data. Note: this permission may not be enforced by third-party browsers or other applications with web-browsing capabilities.
%1$s wants to enable Explore by Touch. When Explore by Touch is turned on, you can hear or see descriptions of what\'s under your finger or perform gestures to interact with SHIELD.
SHIELD
You have incorrectly attempted to unlock SHIELD %d times. After %d more unsuccessful attempts, SHIELD will be reset to the factory default and all user data will be lost.
You have incorrectly attempted to unlock SHIELD %d times. SHIELD will now be reset to the factory default.
You have incorrectly drawn your unlock pattern %d times. After %d more unsuccessful attempts, you will be asked to unlock your SHIELD using an email account.\n\n Try again in %d seconds.
Sleep
